markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Avalanche Boots](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2135)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 102 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn boots

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

While the insides of these boots are comfortable, fur-lined leather, the outsides are a jumble of slate plates, giving the impression of a rockslide. You gain a +3 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks and a +2 circumstance bonus to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34) and [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38). When you invest the boots, you either increase your Strength score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.

<document level="2" id="action-1626" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Avalanche Boots
